description: Peter had a lot of fun last time so he asked me if he could go on the hunt again. Sure, why not. He maybe wanted to show me his talent when he tried to talk a rather rough boy into our little gay games. The boy already started to get aggressive so I would have let him just pass by. But Peter was persistent. Of course I know that he is into blond guys. But this one kept emphasizing that he was straight and having a girlfriend all the time. But money rules. In most cases it´s really just a question of the amount. Of course Peter spent a lot of money this time. But the boy was worth it. I so much enjoyed his stupid straight face when he started to suck. And it was impressive how Peter managed to fuck him.
title: Czech Hunter 52
